full_summary:
----------------

**Notice Title**
---------------

EF236-232036 - Roofing Replacement

**Reference No.**
----------------

WS3974677031-Doc4007232576

**Publication and Closing Date**
-------------------------------

The [Request for Proposal (RFP)](http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/16280389?extsite=MTYyODAzODlfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==) for the Roofing Replacement project was published on 2023-05-15.

The closing date for bid submission is 2023-06-13T14:00:00 (2:00 PM EDT). Late bids will be considered non-responsive.

**Project Details**
-------------------

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC), on behalf of Correctional Services Canada (CSC), is soliciting bids for the rehabilitation of Building 2 at the CFF 6099 Boulevard Lévesque Est institution. The project includes repairing the 2-04 basin, which has become obsolete due to infiltration sources in Laval, Quebec, Canada.

**Contracting Entity**
---------------------

* Name: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* Address: 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage
* City: Gatineau
* Province: Quebec
* Postal Code: K1A 0S5
* Country: Canada

**Contact Information**
----------------------

* Contact Person: Samuel Pearson (SPAC/PSPC)
* Contact Email: [samuel.pearson@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:samuel.pearson@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)
* Trade Agreements: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)

**Bidding Requirements**
-------------------------

All required supporting documentation and bid submission must be submitted by the closing date.

**Additional Information**
---------------------------

* Bid Language: English/French
* Contract Category: CNST
* Procurement Method: Competitive - Open Bidding
* Selection Criteria: Lowest Price
* Regions of Delivery: Laval
